thread.title: Kristina Tara Marion Pilos
thread.title_full: HelloMD reviewed by Kristina Tara Marion Pilos

author: Kristina Tara Marion Pilos
title: Kristina Tara Marion Pilos
text: Wonderful compassionate care! Dr. Andrew VanDermeer (sp?) was very attentive, thorough, kind, caring & understanding. I am so grateful to have found Hello MD! Thank you for your beautiful service! I look forward to being without pain :).
